DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety efficacy CALIBER expandable spacer treatment degenerative disc disease . Radiographic outcomes , intra-operative parameter , clinical outcome , patient satisfaction obtain patient 2 year follow-up clinical study .
